newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan police arrest ex-Bhutto minister.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan police arrest ex-Bhutto minister.

text.p: Pakistani police on Wednesday arrested a former minister in the government of former prime minister Benazir Bhutto in connection with corruption charges, police sources said.

They said Akbar Lasi, who was minister of state for labour before before Bhutto's three-year-old government was sacked in November 5 on disputed charges of corruption and misrule, was arrested on the orders of a two-judge accountability court.
Also arrested with Lasi were his brother Abdul Sattar Lasi and provincial assenmbly member Abdul Karim Nausherwani of the regional Baluchistan National Movement party, police said.
There was no immediate information about the details of charges brought against the three men.
